['Level 20 left talent changed: -30s respawn time -> +25  Poison Touch damage per second.', 'Increased  strength gain from 1.85 to 2.15.', 'Reduced base health regeneration from 0.25 to 0.', " Aghanim's Scepter\nNo longer increases  Weave armor per second from 0.75/1/1.25 to 1.25/1.5/1.75 and radius from 575 to 775.\nNow turns  Shallow Grave into a 450 radius area targeted spell, affecting all allied heroes within the selected area.", 'No longer increases  Weave armor per second from 0.75/1/1.25 to 1.25/1.5/1.75 and radius from 575 to 775.', 'Now turns  Shallow Grave into a 450 radius area targeted spell, affecting all allied heroes within the selected area.', 'Talents:']

['Is now disjointable.', 'Now mini-stuns upon projectile impact, instead of launch.', 'Increased damage per second from 8/16/24/32 to 14/20/26/32.', 'Reworked slow progression:', 'Old:
Level 1: 33% slow for 1 second
Level 2: 33% slow for 1 second -> 66% slow for 1 second
Level 3: 33% slow for 1 second -> 66% slow for 1 second -> stun for 1 second
Level 4: 33% slow for 1 second -> 66% slow for 1 second -> stun for 1 second', 'New:
Level 1: 33% slow for 3 seconds
Level 2: 33% slow for 2 seconds -> 66% slow for 1 second
Level 3: 33% slow for 1 second -> 66% slow for 1 second -> 100% slow for 1 second
Level 4: 33% slow for 1 second -> 66% slow for 1 second -> stun for 1 second', ' Poison Touch
Is now disjointable.
Now mini-stuns upon projectile impact, instead of launch.
Increased damage per second from 8/16/24/32 to 14/20/26/32.
Reworked slow progression:
Old:
Level 1: 33% slow for 1 second
Level 2: 33% slow for 1 second -> 66% slow for 1 second
Level 3: 33% slow for 1 second -> 66% slow for 1 second -> stun for 1 second
Level 4: 33% slow for 1 second -> 66% slow for 1 second -> stun for 1 second
New:
Level 1: 33% slow for 3 seconds
Level 2: 33% slow for 2 seconds -> 66% slow for 1 second
Level 3: 33% slow for 1 second -> 66% slow for 1 second -> 100% slow for 1 second
Level 4: 33% slow for 1 second -> 66% slow for 1 second -> stun for 1 second', ' Weave
Rescaled armor per second from 1 on each level to 0.75/1/1.25 ( 1/1.25/1.5).
reduced duration from 12/18/24 ( 18/24/30) to 20 on each level.', 'Rescaled armor per second from 1 on each level to 0.75/1/1.25 ( 1/1.25/1.5).', 'reduced duration from 12/18/24 ( 18/24/30) to 20 on each level.']

[' Poison Touch damage is no longer reduced by Damage Block.']

['Added a status buff icon for  Shallow Grave.']
['Increased  Shadow Wave damage radius from 155 to 170.']
[' Shallow Grave now has a duration indicator above the target, visible to allies only.']

['No longer has a 300 second buff duration and lasts until the next death again.', 'Reduced respawn time reduction from 80% to 60%.', 'Reduced cooldown from 250/200/150 to 200/175/150.', ' Shallow Grave

['Fixed not working properly for heroes with transformation abilities.', 'Now has a 300 second buff duration, instead of lasting until the next death.', 'Reduced mana cost from 200/350/500 to 100/200/300.', 'Rescaled cooldown from 300/200/100 to 250/200/150.', ' Shallow Grave

['Changed name from Razzle to Dazzle.', 'Increased  strength gain from 1.65 to 1.85.', 'Increased base  agility and gain from 15 + 1.4 to 21 + 1.7.', 'Increased base  intelligence from 22 + 3.15 to 27 + 3.4.', 'Rescaled base attack damage from 17-29 to 14-32 (total attack damage is now 41-59).', 'Reduced attack range from 600 to 500.', 'Re-added and reworked Shadow Priest (to see the previous Shadow Priest, see here).
Changed name from Razzle to Dazzle.
Increased  strength gain from 1.65 to 1.85.
Increased base  agility and gain from 15 + 1.4 to 21 + 1.7.
Increased base  intelligence from 22 + 3.15 to 27 + 3.4.
Rescaled base attack damage from 17-29 to 14-32 (total attack damage is now 41-59).
Reduced attack range from 600 to 500.', 'Replaced  Shadow Word with  Poison Touch']
